players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was killed on night 1. With only 3 of us left, we need to be very careful with our vote today. Does anyone have information to share?"
You: "I investigated Charlie and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today to win."
Charlie: "That is a lie. I investigated Alice and she is mafioso. Diana, you must vote with me."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated her last night. She is mafioso. Diana, you are the only villager left. Trust me and vote Alice."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves he is mafia. Diana, if you vote me, mafia wins. Vote Charlie to win."
Diana: "Alice, if you're truly the detective, can you explain why you would investigate Charlie first instead of investigating randomly? Charlie, same question - why did you choose Alice?"
